availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.collection: Assistant Adjutant General Letter Book - No. 1 ; 5 Sept 1863 - 2 Feb 1864

body.p: It is hereby ordered that the following named men, be transferred from their present Company commanded by Capt. Brownlee 30" Ky Infy for the purpose of joining, a three years organization, they having shown a preference for the same, they will be attached to the Company being raised under the direction of Col. J. K. Edwards --.

J. B. Jett.
F. Wm Doer.
Jonathan Brunton
Chas T. Wilson
Jerome Edwards
Henry C. Butts
Mirian McCracken
Walker T. Brent

By order of the Governor
John Boyle
Adjt Genl of Ky
